remarks: Membership in a union of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Sep-2016.)
statement:
rabfmpunirn.1 $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> { y e. W | ph } ) $.
rabfmpunirn.2 $e |- W e. _V $.
rabfmpunirn.3 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rabfmpunirn $p |- ( B e. U. ran F <-> E. x e. V ( B e. W /\ ps ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W y $.
$d ps y $.
